body.p: After creating your custom refactoring operations, you can share them with other team members. To share a custom operation with other users, use one of the following methods:

li.p: , go to XML XML Refactoring , and specify a folder for your custom operations in the Load additional refactoring operations from text box. Make sure you have copied your custom XQuery update script and descriptor file into the specified folder.

You can also share the custom operations by sharing an entire project. To do so, , go to XML XML Refactoring , and select Project Options at the bottom of the dialog box. In the Load additional refactoring operations from text box, use the ${pd} editor variable so that the folder is declared relative to the project.

ul.li: Distribute the custom operation along with a framework by creating the refactoring folder in the framework directory and copy the custom XQuery update script and descriptor file into this folder.
Implement the [Refactoring operations plugin] that specifies the additional folder from which the custom operations are loaded.
